details: The "Tiatr Cantaram Singing Competition", organised by the Kala Academy under the Department of Art, Culture and Museums, Government of Goa, aims to promote singing talent, preserve and revive the tradition of Tiatr songs, and encourage both traditional and new compositions that reflect Goa’s rich Tiatr heritage.
benefits: A common music band is provided by Kala Academy free of cost for practice and competition.
Each participant gets ₹150/- as travel and daily allowance.
Winners receive cash prizes in different categories.
eligibility: The Competition is open to all Goan artists.
application_process: Step 1: The interested applicant should visit the Kala Academy, Goa, and request a hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form free of charge from the Program & Development Section, Tiatr Academy of Goa.

Step 2: In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required).
Step 3: Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents, within the prescribed period (if any), to the Member Secretary, Kala Academy, Goa.
documents_required: Four typed copies of the song lyrics.
No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the original composer.
